page.title: 05BICKINGTON,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: Mr Gayton is a man who has lived in {Bickington}all his life,45 years.We asked him some questions on how {Bickington}has changed during that time.{Bickington}is ten times bigger than it was 45 years ago.Mr Gayton went to{Bickington}school,which was a small village school that closed in the 1950's.You were not allowed to speak in class. There used to be two shops and a post office with a shop. {Bickington}was a village where there was not much traffic, mostly horses and carts.It was much quieter than it is now.Mr Gayton thought that {Bickington}was better when he was a youngster because it was a village and friendlier. When the by_pass is built it might be like old{Bickington}again Now you can not cross the road for traffic going to Barnstaple,sometimes you have to wait for half an hour.
